channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK weather: Exact time Icelandic wall of rain to batter Britain with '34 days of downpours'
item.description: Nearly half of an average August rainfall is to batter parts of the UK in just three hours this week, and temperatures will fall dramatically as the scorching summer comes to a halt

item.title: The mystery of bizarre creature that prowled our oceans 500,000,000 years ago
item.description: It has been nicknamed the 'alien fish taco'.

item.title: Four-day-old twins both killed in Gaza while dad went to register their births
item.description: A newborn boy and girl were killed along with their mum and maternal grandmother in an airstrike as their father went to register their births in a local government office in Gaza

item.title: Woman who said her husband chained her to tree for 40 days ‘tied herself up’
item.description: The woman initially claimed her husband had left her in the forest for 40 days.

item.title: Warning as Screwfix phishing scam targets tradespeople’s bank details – ‘do not click’
item.description: The emails use convincing Screwfix branding and create a false sense of urgency by claiming the offer is expiring the same day

item.title: Ancient 4,000-year-old Babylonian tablets finally deciphered - with ominous predictions
item.description: Newly deciphered texts found on tablets around 4,000 years old predict death and destruction. The people who wrote them used lunar eclipses to predict plagues of locusts

item.title: DWP data raises alarm over pensioners who should get winter fuel payments but won't
item.description: Charity Independent Age has warned a shake-up of winter fuel payments could be dangerous as new data suggests hundreds of thousands who are entitled to it could miss out
